00031 /****************************************************************************************************/
00032 /*                                                                                                  */
00033 /*                                                                                                  */
00034 /*                                                                                                  */
00035 /****************************************************************************************************/
00036 TBTrackBaseProcessor::TBTrackBaseProcessor(const std::string &n) : Processor(n), _hFile(0) 
00037 {
00038   _description = "Base class for TBTrack processors";
00039 
00040   _printLevel=0;
00041   registerProcessorParameter("PrintLevel", 
00042                              "Print level",
00043                              _printLevel,_printLevel);
00044 
00045   _printEventNumber=-1;
00046   registerProcessorParameter("PrintEventNumber", 
00047                              "Print event number",
00048                              _printEventNumber,_printEventNumber);
00049 
00050   _printEventLevel=3;
00051   registerProcessorParameter("PrintEventLevel", 
00052                              "Print event level",
00053                              _printEventLevel,_printEventLevel);
00054 
00055   _simTrackerHitCollection="TBSimTrackerHits";
00056   registerProcessorParameter("SimTrackerHitCollection",
00057                              "SimTrackerHit collection name",
00058                              _simTrackerHitCollection,
00059                              _simTrackerHitCollection);
00060 
00061   _tdcHitCollection="TBTrackTdcHits";
00062   registerProcessorParameter("TdcHitCollection",
00063                              "TdcHit collection name",
00064                              _tdcHitCollection,
00065                              _tdcHitCollection);
00066 
00067   _trackProjectionCollection="TBTrackProjection";
00068   registerProcessorParameter("TrackProjectionCollection",
00069                              "TrackProjection collection name",
00070                              _trackProjectionCollection,
00071                              _trackProjectionCollection);
00072 
00073   _obsoleteMokkaCollections=0;
00074   registerProcessorParameter("ObsoleteMokkaCollections",
00075                              "For Mokka sim using multiple DC Collections",
00076                              _obsoleteMokkaCollections,
00077                              _obsoleteMokkaCollections);
00078 
00079   _beamMomentum=0;
00080   registerProcessorParameter("beamMomentum",
00081                              "beam momentum: WARNING will overwrite what is in database for data runs!",
00082                              _beamMomentum,
00083                              _beamMomentum);
00084 
00085 }

00099 /****************************************************************************************************/
00100 void TBTrackBaseProcessor::init() 
00101 {
00102   _iCall=0;
00103   
00104   // Flag constants as invalid
00105   _mapConstantsUpdated = false;
00106   _mapConstantsValid   = false;
00107 
00108   _simConstantsUpdated = false;
00109   _simConstantsValid   = false;
00110 
00111   _alnConstantsUpdated = false;
00112   _alnConstantsValid   = false;
00113 
00114   _fitConstantsUpdated = false;
00115   _fitConstantsValid   = false;
00116 
00117   _runInformationUpdated = false;
00118   _runInformationValid   = false;
00119 
00120   streamlog_out(DEBUG) << "Constants initialised to invalid" << endl;
00121   // Initialise run and event numbers
00122   _nRun = 0;
00123   _nEvt = 0;
00124   _iRun = -1;
00125   _iEvt = -1;
00126 
00127   // Print processor parameters
00128   printParameters();
00129 
00130   // Call inherited method
00131   Init();
00132 }

00134 /****************************************************************************************************/
00135 /*                                                                                                  */
00136 /*                                                                                                  */
00137 /*                                                                                                  */
00138 /****************************************************************************************************/
00139 void TBTrackBaseProcessor::processRunHeader(LCRunHeader* run) 
00140 {
00141   _iRun = run->getRunNumber();
00142   _iEvt = -1;
00143   _iCall = 1;
00144 
00145   streamlog_out(DEBUG)<< " Processing run " << _nRun
00146               << " with run number " 
00147               << run->getRunNumber() << endl;
00148   
00149   // Fill the local copies of the constants
00150   _runInformation.get(run);
00151   _runInformationValid = true; // Should be dependent on get() above
00152   if(printLevel(1)) _runInformation.print();
00153 
00154   std::ostringstream sout;
00155   if(_runInformation.isMC()) sout << "Sim";
00156   else                       sout << "Dat";
00157   sout << std::setw(6) << std::setfill('0') << _iRun;
00158   _runString = sout.str();
00159 
00160 
00161   std::string year=_runInformation.runMonth().substr(_runInformation.runMonth().size()-2, 2);
00162 
00163   if (_runInformation.location() == "Desy") 
00164     { 
00165       _tdcRawDataCollection=COL_TDC;
00166     } 
00167   else if (_runInformation.location() == "Cern") 
00168     {
00169       if ( year == "06" || year == "07" ) 
00170         {
00171           _tdcRawDataCollection = COL_CAEN767TDC;
00172         } 
00173       else 
00174         { // 2010, 2011 WHCAL
00175           _tdcRawDataCollection = COL_CAENTDC;
00176         }
00177     } 
00178   else if (_runInformation.location() == "Fnal") 
00179     {
00180       _tdcRawDataCollection=COL_CAEN767TDC;
00181     }
00182   std::cout << "----  " << name() << ", Name of raw tracks collection: " << _tdcRawDataCollection << std::endl;
00183 
00184   //_runInformation.print();
00185   // Call inherited method
00186   ProcessRunHeader(run);
00187 
00188   _nRun++;
00189 }
00190 
00191 /****************************************************************************************************/
00192 /*                                                                                                  */
00193 /*                                                                                                  */
00194 /*                                                                                                  */
00195 /****************************************************************************************************/
00196 void TBTrackBaseProcessor::processEvent(LCEvent *evt) 
00197 {
00198   const int printLevelSave(_printLevel);
00199   if(_nEvt == _printEventNumber) _printLevel = _printEventLevel;
00200 
00201   _iEvt  = evt->getEventNumber();
00202   _iCall = 2;
00203 
00204   streamlog_out(DEBUG) << " TBtrackBaseProcessor:Processing event " << _nEvt
00205                << " with event number " 
00206                << evt->getEventNumber() << endl;
00207   
00208   // Fill the local copies of the constants
00209   getEvtConstants(evt);
00210 
00211   // Call inherited method
00212   ProcessEvent(evt);
00213 
00214   streamlog_out(DEBUG) << "--- TBTrackBaseProcessor::processEvent() End of processing : " << name() << endl;
00215 
00216   _printLevel = printLevelSave;
00217   _nEvt++;
00218 }
00219 
00220 /****************************************************************************************************/
00221 /*                                                                                                  */
00222 /*                                                                                                  */
00223 /*                                                                                                  */
00224 /****************************************************************************************************/
00225 void TBTrackBaseProcessor::end() 
00226 {
00227   _iRun = -1;
00228   _iEvt = -1;
00229   _iCall = 3;
00230 
00231   streamlog_out(DEBUG) << " Processed " << _nEvt << " events in "
00232                << _nRun << " runs " << endl;
00233   
00234   // Call inherited method
00235   End();
00236 }

00238 /****************************************************************************************************/
00239 /*                                                                                                  */
00240 /*                                                                                                  */
00241 /*                                                                                                  */
00242 /****************************************************************************************************/
00243 bool TBTrackBaseProcessor::printLevel(int p, bool b) const 
00244 {
00245   if(p > _printLevel) return false;
00246 
00247   if(b) 
00248     {
00249       if(p >= -1) 
00250         {
00251           cout << endl << name() << "::";
00252           if(_iCall<=0) cout << "Init()";
00253           if(_iCall==1) cout << "ProcessRunHeader()";
00254           if(_iCall==2) cout << "ProcessEvent()";
00255           if(_iCall>=3) cout << "End()";
00256           
00257           if(_iRun>=0) cout << " Run " << _iRun;
00258           if(_iEvt>=0) cout << " Event " << _iEvt;
00259           
00260           if(p==-1) cout << " WARNING";
00261           cout << endl << " ";
00262           
00263         } 
00264       else 
00265         {
00266           std::cerr << name() << "::";
00267           if(_iCall<=0) std::cerr << "Init()";
00268           if(_iCall==1) std::cerr << "ProcessRunHeader()";
00269           if(_iCall==2) std::cerr << "ProcessEvent()";
00270           if(_iCall>=3) std::cerr << "End()";
00271           
00272           if(_iRun>=0) std::cerr << " Run " << _iRun;
00273           if(_iEvt>=0) std::cerr << " Event " << _iEvt;
00274           
00275           if(p==-2) std::cerr << " ERROR";
00276           if(p<=-3) std::cerr << " FATAL";
00277           std::cerr << endl << " ";
00278         }
00279     }
00280   
00281   return true;
00282 }

00285 /****************************************************************************************************/
00286 /*                                                                                                  */
00287 /*                                                                                                  */
00288 /*                                                                                                  */
00289 /****************************************************************************************************/
00290 void TBTrackBaseProcessor::getEvtConstants(const LCEvent *evt) 
00291 {
00292   const LCCollection *c(0);
00293 
00294   if( (c = getCollection(evt,"TBTrackMapConstants",LCIO::LCGENERICOBJECT,false)) != 0) 
00295     {
00296       assert(c->getNumberOfElements() == 1);
00297       
00298       const LCPayload<MapConstants> p(dynamic_cast<LCGenericObject*>(c->getElementAt(0)));
00299       _mapConstants        = p.payload();
00300       _mapConstantsUpdated = true;
00301       _mapConstantsValid   = true;
00302       
00303       if(printLevel(1)) _mapConstants.print() << endl;
00304     } 
00305   else 
00306     {
00307       _mapConstantsUpdated = false;
00308     }
00309 
00310   if( (c = getCollection(evt,"TBTrackSimConstants",LCIO::LCGENERICOBJECT,false)) != 0) 
00311     {
00312       assert(c->getNumberOfElements() == 1);
00313       const LCPayload<SimConstants> p(dynamic_cast<LCGenericObject*>(c->getElementAt(0)));
00314       _simConstants        = p.payload();
00315       _simConstantsUpdated = true;
00316       _simConstantsValid   = true;
00317       if(printLevel(1)) _simConstants.print() << endl;
00318     } 
00319   else 
00320     {
00321       _simConstantsUpdated=false;
00322     }
00323 
00324   if( (c=getCollection(evt,"TBTrackAlnConstants", LCIO::LCGENERICOBJECT,false)) != 0) 
00325     {
00326       assert(c->getNumberOfElements()==1);
00327       const LCPayload<AlnConstants> p(dynamic_cast<LCGenericObject*>(c->getElementAt(0)));
00328       _alnConstants        = p.payload();
00329       _alnConstantsUpdated = true;
00330       _alnConstantsValid   = true;
00331       
00332       if(printLevel(1)) _alnConstants.print() << endl;
00333   } 
00334   else 
00335     {
00336       _alnConstantsUpdated = false;
00337     }
00338   
00339   if( (c = getCollection(evt,"TBTrackFitConstants",LCIO::LCGENERICOBJECT,false)) != 0) 
00340     {
00341       assert(c->getNumberOfElements() == 1);
00342       const LCPayload<FitConstants> p(dynamic_cast<LCGenericObject*>(c->getElementAt(0)));
00343       _fitConstants        = p.payload();
00344       _fitConstantsUpdated = true;
00345       _fitConstantsValid   = true;
00346       
00347       if(printLevel(1)) _fitConstants.print() << std::endl;
00348     } 
00349   else 
00350     {
00351       _fitConstantsUpdated=false;
00352     }
00353 }

00355 /****************************************************************************************************/
00356 /*                                                                                                  */
00357 /*                                                                                                  */
00358 /*                                                                                                  */
00359 /****************************************************************************************************/
00360 const EVENT::LCCollection* TBTrackBaseProcessor::getCollection(const LCEvent *evt, 
00361                                                                const std::string &name,
00362                                                                const std::string &type,
00363                                                                bool allowPrint) const 
00364 {
00365   const EVENT::LCCollection *col = NULL;
00366   
00367   try {
00368     col = evt->getCollection(name);
00369     if(col != 0) 
00370       {
00371         streamlog_out(DEBUG)<<"Got collection "<<col<<" with name "<<name<<" and type "<<col->getTypeName()<<endl;
00372 
00373         if(col->getTypeName() != type) 
00374           {
00375             if(allowPrint && printLevel(-1)) 
00376               {
00377                 cout << "getCollection() Collection name " << name 
00378                      << " with requested type " << type
00379                      << " has actual type " << col->getTypeName() << endl;
00380               }
00381             col = 0;
00382           }
00383       } 
00384     else 
00385       {
00386         if(allowPrint && printLevel(-1)) 
00387           {
00388             cout << "getCollection() Collection name " << name 
00389                  << " returns null pointer" << endl;
00390           }
00391       }
00392     
00393   } 
00394   catch (DataNotAvailableException &e) 
00395     {
00396       col = 0;
00397       if(allowPrint && printLevel(-1)) 
00398         {
00399           cout << "getCollection() Collection name " << name 
00400                << " not found" << endl;
00401         }
00402     }
00403   
00404   return col;
00405 }
00406 
00407 /****************************************************************************************************/
00408 /*                                                                                                  */
00409 /*                                                                                                  */
00410 /*                                                                                                  */
00411 /****************************************************************************************************/
00412 bool TBTrackBaseProcessor::addCollection(EVENT::LCEvent *evt, 
00413                                          EVENT::LCCollection *c,
00414                                          const std::string &name,
00415                                          bool allowPrint) const 
00416 {
00417   try 
00418     {
00419       evt->addCollection(c,name);
00420       return true;      
00421     } 
00422   catch (EventException &e) 
00423     {
00424       if(allowPrint && printLevel(-1)) 
00425         {
00426           cout << "addCollection() Collection name " << name 
00427                << " already exists" << endl;
00428         }
00429     }
00430   return false;
00431 }

00435 /*                                                                                                  */
00436 /*                                                                                                  */
00437 /****************************************************************************************************/
00438 void TBTrackBaseProcessor::openHFile(const EVENT::LCRunHeader *run) 
00439 {
00440   // Define the current directory so that root don't put a mess ....
00441   //TDirectory* current = gDirectory;
00442   
00443   // Create an output file name with the run number
00444   /*
00445   std::ostringstream sout;
00446   sout << name();
00447   if(_runInformation.isMC()) sout << "Sim";
00448   else                       sout << "Dat";
00449   if(run->getRunNumber()==0) sout << "00000";
00450   sout << run->getRunNumber() << ".root";
00451   */
00452 
00453   std::string fileName(name()+_runString+".root");
00454   if(printLevel(1)) std::cout << "Recreating ROOT file "
00455                               << fileName << std::endl;
00456   
00457   // Create the output file
00458   if((_hFile=TFile::Open(fileName.c_str(),"RECREATE"))==0) {
00459     if(printLevel(-3)) std::cerr << "Cannot recreate ROOT file "
00460                                  << fileName << std::endl;
00461     assert(false);
00462   }
00463   
00464   /*by default when a file is created, if the functions hfile->Write() and hfile->Close() are called at the end, 
00465     every ROOT object defined in the include file will be saved, without having to call individually write().*/
00466   
00467   //hfile->mkdir("CHECK histograms")->cd();
00468 }

00470 /****************************************************************************************************/
00471 /*                                                                                                  */
00472 /*                                                                                                  */
00473 /*                                                                                                  */
00474 /****************************************************************************************************/
00475 void TBTrackBaseProcessor::closeHFile() 
00476 {
00477   if(_hFile != 0) 
00478     {
00479       streamlog_out(DEBUG) << "Closing histogram file" << endl;
00480       
00481       _hFile->Write();
00482       _hFile->Close();
00483       
00484       delete _hFile;
00485       _hFile = 0;
00486     } 
00487 }

00489 /****************************************************************************************************/
00490 /*                                                                                                  */
00491 /*                                                                                                  */
00492 /*                                                                                                  */
00493 /****************************************************************************************************/
00494 void TBTrackBaseProcessor::getSimTrackerHits(LCEvent *evt) 
00495 {
00496   const LCCollection *c(0);
00497   
00498   LCCollectionVec* outdcCol(new LCCollectionVec(LCIO::SIMTRACKERHIT));
00499   addCollection(evt,outdcCol,_simTrackerHitCollection); // Only if !=0?
00500   
00501   std::string _dc0ColName,_dc1ColName,_dc2ColName,_dc3ColName;
00502   
00503   // DESY; DC1 and DC2 are swapped
00504   if (_runInformation.location() == RunInformation::desy)
00505     {
00506       _dc0ColName="TBdch02_dchSD2";
00507       _dc1ColName="TBdch02_dchSD1";
00508       _dc2ColName="TBdch02_dchSD3";
00509       _dc3ColName="TBdch02_dchSD4";
00510     }
00511   else 
00512     {//cern
00513       _dc0ColName="DoesNotExist";
00514       _dc1ColName="TBdch04_01_dchSD1";
00515       _dc2ColName="TBdch04_01_dchSD2";
00516       _dc3ColName="TBdch04_01_dchSD3";
00517     }
00518   
00519   for(unsigned layer(0); layer < 4; layer++) 
00520     {
00521       if((layer == 0 && (c = getCollection(evt, _dc0ColName,LCIO::SIMTRACKERHIT)) != 0) ||
00522          (layer == 1 && (c = getCollection(evt, _dc1ColName,LCIO::SIMTRACKERHIT)) != 0) ||
00523          (layer == 2 && (c = getCollection(evt, _dc2ColName,LCIO::SIMTRACKERHIT)) != 0) ||
00524          (layer == 3 && (c = getCollection(evt, _dc3ColName,LCIO::SIMTRACKERHIT)) != 0)) 
00525         {
00526         
00527         for(int i(0); i<c->getNumberOfElements(); i++) 
00528           {
00529             const SimTrackerHit *p(dynamic_cast<const SimTrackerHit*>(c->getElementAt(i)));
00530             SimTrackerHitImpl *q(new SimTrackerHitImpl);
00531             
00532             const double *r(p->getPosition());
00533 
00534             double rr[3];
00535             rr[0] = r[0];
00536             rr[1] = r[1];
00537             rr[2] = r[2];
00538             q->setPosition(rr);
00539 
00540             double zx(fabs(rr[2]-_fitConstants.zLayer(0,layer)));
00541             double zy(fabs(rr[2]-_fitConstants.zLayer(1,layer)));
00542 
00543             streamlog_out(DEBUG)<< "Z, DZ for " << i << " = " << rr[2] << ", " << _fitConstants.zLayer(0,layer)
00544                         << " or " << _fitConstants.zLayer(1,layer) << " so " << zx << ", " << zy << endl;
00545             
00546             if(zx<zy) q->setCellID0(2*layer  );
00547             else      q->setCellID(02*layer+1);
00548             
00549             q->setdEdx(p->getdEdx());
00550             q->setTime(p->getTime());
00551             
00552             q->setMCParticle(p->getMCParticle());
00553             
00554             const float *m(p->getMomentum());
00555             q->setMomentum(m[0],m[1],m[2]);
00556             
00557             q->setPathLength(p->getPathLength());
00558             
00559             outdcCol->addElement(q);
00560           }
00561         }
00562     }
00563   
00564   
00565 }
Generated on 1 Dec 2017 for RAW2CALOHIT by  1.6.1
